H0.text: What is the capital of the U S state of Pennsylvania. Philadelphia

H1.text: What is the capital of the U S state of Pennsylvania. Pittsburgh

H2.text: What is the capital of the U S state of Pennsylvania. Lancaster

H3.text: What is the capital of the U S state of Pennsylvania. Harrisburg

A4.text: Harrisburg is the capital city of the U.S. commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

A5.text: The Pennsylvania State Capitol Complex dominates the city's stature as a regional and national hub for government and politics. All administrative functions of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania are located within the complex and at various nearby locations.
